title: What Students at Lagos State University choose to study
summary: This chart represents the popularity of courses at Lagos State University .
\\n Medicine and Philosophy are the most popular subjects , with just over 60 percentage of the Students choosing to Study in one of these areas .
\\n Only 15 percentage of Students chose to Study STEM subjects .
gold: What the students at Lagos State University choose to study have been fairly equal with STEM being the lowest at 15 % and medicine being the highest at 31 % with the other course of studies being in between them .
